attributes.action: Advise the Queen to make Richard Dawkins a Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Richard Dawkins has for years led a significant campaign to spread the voice of reason. He is an accomplished author and scientist as well as a Professor at Oxford.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
